name: Keygard
description:
Keygard

It was originally  book with music, but after a few years I decided to bring this world into the game. The world of Keygard have 2 parts, Shadows of Serebrile is a prequel to the main story that tells about the origin of evil in the land of Keygard. The Swamp Elves are the main story about the difficult fate of the inhabitants of the city Tankvilas, who lost their home and went on a journey to create an alliance against evil in the land of Keygard. 

Each level of the game corresponds to a chapter of the book, because this game is about an elven swamp, and the first character you play as Ermund, the great magician of Tankvilas.

All lvl:
  1. Crystal Cave - done
  2. Labyrinth of Grindmur - 50%
  3. Tregan Forest - coming soon
  4. Litirite Waterfalls  - coming soon
  5. Ivory Tower - coming soon
  6. Blackwall - coming soon
  7. Flower of Life - coming soon
